Brookhaven.Piedmont Hospital:
Piedmont Atlanta Hospital is a 488 bed, non-profit hospital located at 1968 Peachtree Road, Atlanta, Georgia.


== History ==
Piedmont was established in 1905 as the Piedmont Sanitarium, the successor to Amster's private sanitorium, in the former mansion of Charles Thomas Swift of S.S.S. Tonic. The mansion was located at the northwest corner of Capitol and Crumley streets in the then-affluent Washington-Rawson neighborhood.
